name: Prometheus - The Fire Thief
description: Prometheus - The Fire Thief is an action adventure game set in ancient Greece. As the player you assume control of the titan Prometheus. After stealing the fire from the Gods of mount Olympus, Prometheus must travel all across Greece and outside its borders, battling hideous monsters.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Dual Core 3.2 Ghz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated graphics card DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 8 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Sound card Additional Notes: Game will run with very low specs.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Quad Core i5 3.2 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce or similar DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 8 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Sound card Additional Notes: High specs not required.
